metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0938 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In memzero_explicit of compiler-clang.h, there is a possible bypass of defense in depth due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-171418586References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.10.0-14.15').
